Subject: Re: It's Battle Time
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Double 
Punch/Injector/Bumblebee/Ares/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot:




Dark One easily dodged the missiles, but caught two claws in the left side of 
his fighter form, and returned fire with two missiles down at Blade Runner.  
Five missiles dug into his wings.

---

Breakdown raised his grenade launcher after he got to his feet, firing off a 
grenade set to explode on impact at Silverbolt, firing off an arc of sonic 
energy at Angel Prime from his sonic blaster.  He ignored the three nails 
that dug into his knee.

---

Pyro laughed as the fire ball hit his chest, doing nothing.  
-Idiot-, Pyro thought, -Like a pyromaniac would allow himself to be damaged 
by his OWN weapon of choice-

Pyro didn't see Shocker, and was sent slamming to the side, all the missiles 
going by him.  He raised his weapon, firing off three fire balls at Shocker.

---

Hiss still didn't move, but the effects of the electromagnetic pulse cannon 
as starting to wear off.

---

Scavenger raised his chain gun, firing off 25 armor piercing rounds at Angel 
Prime when he saw him try and take out Pyro.  He ducked under the missile but 
took the shots from Ratchet.

---

Sixshot felt the cold of the ice breath hit him, but he ignored it, merely 
adjusting the temperature inside himself to 200 degrees farenheit.  The cold 
would keep him from reaching critical temperatures of heat and damage any 
components inside himself.

The bullets bounced off his armored form, and he swerved his turret, firing 
off two blasts from the cannon attached to his turret off at Icedragon.  The 
nails bounced off is current form.

---
 
Demon Wulf raised his palm, firing off three blasts at Depth Charge.

---

Flesh Ripper fired off 25 rapid laser blasts from his rifle at Silverbolt.  
He was slammed to his back by the missile, and int he process dodged the 
shots.

---

Dark Claw fired off two missiles at the Cybertronian Fire, a missile striking 
his armored form.  He roared in pain, transforming to his biped mode, two 
blue orbs forming, one in each hand.

---

Double Punch cursed as his missiles were destroyed.  He fired off one 
energy-signature seeking missile at Tigerhawk from one pincher, and fired off 
another at Sideswipe from the other.

---

Injector got hit by the blasts in his left side, and heard a right crack as 
he began leaking mech-fluid from a portion of that side.  He cursed, firing 
off three stinger missiles at Blade Runner from one launcher, and three more 
at Orion from the other.

---

Bumblebee ducked in mid-air under five shots, catching three in the left 
pectoral.  He cursed at the pain, firing off three stinger missiles at 
Shocker, firing another three from the other launcher at Ratchet.

---

Manterror flew through the air, firing off three ion disks from one arm at 
Angel Prime, firing off another three from the other arm at Tigerhawk.

---

Ares cursed as the missile and shots struck his armor that was starting to 
give way.  He couldn't take much more onslaughts like that.  It was time to 
end them.  He trained all three of his cannons of his tank mode on Sideswipe, 
firing four blasts from each, twelve shots heading for Sideswipe.

---

Nemesis Enforcer yelled to Scattershot.  "Fool, fight the ground troops!" he 
said as three optic blasts from the second-in-command blew apart one of the 
three remaining EMP cannons, and blocked an EMP blast with his left wing and 
took flight.

He leveled his rapid-firing laser rifle, firing off 25 rapid laser blasts at 
Angel Prime.

---

Scattershot cursed at Nemesis and raised his rifle, firing off 25 shells at 
Depth Charge.
